str.txt: The Derby database has been selected. It needs a directory to store data files.
New Tigase server configuration generated. Press 'Next' to save the configuration, 'Prev' to make changes. You can also edit settings here and press 'Next' to save them.
Checking database connection and the database schema.
The installed application needs a JDK between version ${JDKPathPanel.minVersion} and ${JDKPathPanel.maxVersion}. A java runtime environment (JRE) will be not sufficient.
The installed application needs a JDK. A java runtime environment (JRE) will be not sufficient.
The chosen JDK has the wrong version (available:
) should this JDK be used anyway?
The Windows registry contains a non-valid path for this JDK. Should this JDK be used anyway?

If you don't have JDK installed on your system please go to address: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads and select JDK. Download it and install and proceed with the Tigase server installation.

You need at least ${JDKPathPanel.minVersion} version of Java JDK.
